item.title: Key exchange standards - Manning
item.description: From Real-World Cryptography by David Wong In this article, the author teaches readers about the Diffie-Hellman key exchange standard, which was the very first key exchange algorithm ever invented, and the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman key exchange standard, which is the Diffie-Hellman built with elliptic curves.
item.author: (From Real-World Cryptography by David Wong)
